description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Definitely the sweetest game you'll have ever played!  Build a kingdom out of candy, in a world made entirely of... candy! Match-3 game with a fresh twist on the genre.  - Cross-platform competition via online highscores - Quality artwork - Engaging gameplay  Grab the game & start building your candy empire. Make yourself a pleasure, get hypnotized and beat your friends highscores on-line!
